verses.verse: A Psalm of David. Jehovah <WH3068>, who shall sojourn <WH7931> in thy tabernacle <WH168>? Who shall dwell <WH7931> in thy holy <WH6944> hill <WH2022>?
He that walketh <WH1980> uprightly <WH8549>, and worketh <WH6466> righteousness <WH6664>, And speaketh <WH1696> truth <WH571> in his heart <WH3824>;
He that slandereth <WH7270> not with his tongue <WH3956>, Nor doeth <WH6213> evil <WH7451> to his friend <WH7453>, Nor taketh up <WH5375> a reproach <WH2781> against his neighbor <WH7138>;

In whose eyes <WH5869> a reprobate <WH3988> is despised <WH959>, But who honoreth <WH3513> them that fear <WH3373> Jehovah <WH3068>; He that sweareth <WH7650> to his own hurt <WH7489>, and changeth not <WH4171>;

He that putteth not out <WH5414> his money <WH3701> to interest <WH5392>, Nor taketh <WH3947> reward <WH7810> against the innocent <WH5355>. He that doeth <WH6213> these things shall never <WH5769> be moved <WH4131>.
